title: webdav: leading slash confuses directory listing
body:
Hello,

Thanks for this tool. It's very simple to use it and very amazing about functionnality !

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
I have an issue while deleting files from NextCloud storage system. There's no deletetion at all.

#### What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
rclone v1.40
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.10

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Linux rclone 3.16.0-4-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 3.16.43-2+deb8u5 (2017-09-19) x86_64 GNU/Linux

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Webdav - NextCloud

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
./rclone --config ../../core/config/rclone.conf delete 90:/test/plugin_info

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.40" starting with parameters ["./rclone" "-vv" "--config" "../../core/config/rclone.conf" "delete" "90:/test/plugin_info"]
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Using config file from "/var/www/html/plugins/cloudsyncpro/core/config/rclone.conf"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 INFO  : webdav root '/test/plugin_info': Modify window is 1s
2018/04/16 09:39:28 INFO  : Waiting for deletions to finish
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/configuration.php", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/info.json", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/info.xml", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/install.php", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : Item with unknown path received: "/remote.php/webdav/test/plugin_info/netatmopro_icon.png", "/test/plugin_info/"
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : 2 go routines active
2018/04/16 09:39:28 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.40" finishing with parameters ["./rclone" "-vv" "--config" "../../core/config/rclone.conf" "delete" "90:/test/plugin_info"]
